reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's rich brown color, describing it as gorgeous for fall, and appreciate that it fits perfectly and hugs the body nicely.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely love this dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. Absolutely love this dress! The fit is perfect and super flattering â€” it hugs the body nicely without being too tight. The fabric feels soft and comfortable, and the off-shoulder design adds such an elegant touch. I also love the flared sleeves and pleated skirt; they give it a really feminine look. The rich brown color is gorgeous for fall and pairs beautifully with boots. I got so many compliments when I wore it! Totally recommend! Read more
items.author: Tania Alves Usa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Please read honest review.
items.body: I really like this dress. The reason for four stars goes as follow. 1. If you have thick arms or big shoulders your dress WILL roll up, show the white seam and not give the arrearance of off the shoulder look. Its nerve racking to be honest... 2. The seam on the dress that gives the tu tu look is oddly placed. Other than those reasons...I like the dress and I am wearing it again. Im 5",3 185lbs and I bought a LG and it fits great. Hope this helps Read more
items.author: Francesca Jones

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dont order!!! Difficult to return through this seller
items.body: This dress would honestly be so cute but the back shows your hind end. My biggest issue is this seller makes it very hard for returns. Ive never returned something and it took up to two weeks processing, never again!! Thats ridiculous Read more
items.author: Sheniqua Lockhart

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Dress
items.body: Cute too big for me returned it Read more
items.author: angelique

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect short brown dress
items.body: I absolutely love this short long-sleeve brown dress! The fit is super flattering and comfortable, hugging in all the right places without feeling too tight. The rich brown color is perfect for fall and winter, but honestly, itâ€™s neutral enough to wear year-round. The long sleeves give it a chic, elegant vibe, while the shorter length keeps it fun and modern. Iâ€™ve worn it with boots for a casual day out and dressed it up with heels for dinner so versatile! Definitely a new staple in my wardrobe. Read more
items.author: ROSE

items.body: Very nice martial and very flattering to wear. I wore this for a witch costume this year & I got many compliments on the dress. Read more

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
